column5: Hello All,  Can't seem to figure out how to embed a youtube video into my post. I have tried copying the embed code, the url, and a host of other things - it will show up as a link, but how do I showcase the video directly on the page. Any help would be greatly appreciated.   Cheers,  Justin
Paste the embed code in your post, but in posting options, make sure html is enabled...I use auto line break mode.
Boy I have a deal for you bud. I,ll come and see you and show you first hand,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,AAfter a days bass,n.  Under options theres configure.Click on it and click on raw.
Cliff,dont give it away for free.SHEECH.
Thanks for all of the quick replies, guys. Jedi's was the first I read and it worked perfect! So easy...  Oh, and Brian...you're welcome anytime, bud.  Cheers,  Justin
Oops!!!!!!!  Maybe he'll take me fishing one day rofl!
